Control Name: Where other authentication mechanisms are used (for example, physical or logical security tokens, smart cards, certificates, etc.), use of these mechanisms must be assigned as follows:\n- Authentication mechanisms must be assigned to an individual account and not shared among multiple accounts.\n- Physical and/or logical controls must be in place to ensure only the intended account can use that mechanism to gain access.

control_attributes.Control: Where other authentication mechanisms are used (for example, physical or logical security tokens, smart cards, certificates, etc.), use of these mechanisms must be assigned as follows:\n- Authentication mechanisms must be assigned to an individual account and not shared among multiple accounts.\n- Physical and/or logical controls must be in place to ensure only the intended account can use that mechanism to gain access.
control_attributes.Requirement: 8.6.Identify and authenticate access to system components
